entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Bridgewater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 09:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: N 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of thundershowers this afternoon. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
